name: Marie Hernandez
what_you_do: Marie Hernandez guides women to build travel and retreat businesses that feel aligned and abundant, leveraging her expertise in digital entrepreneurship and strategic partnerships.
who_you_serve: She serves women, particularly those aged 50+, who are looking to embrace digital entrepreneurship and create successful travel and retreat businesses.
signature_programs: STVPN – Seriously Travel Vetted Partner Network
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Empowering women 50+ to embrace digital entrepreneurship and travel the world on sponsorships.
bio: Over 15 years of experience in travel and 5 years leading retreats; founder of STVPN.
business_focus: Marie Hernandez guides women to build travel and retreat businesses that feel aligned and abundant, leveraging her expertise in digital entrepreneurship and strategic partnerships. (travel coaching)
